paragraphs.text:
I am a student at the prestigious
               @@BovAcademy/class='about__link', and I am an aspiring Full-stack
               developer who specializes in creating modern and attractive web
               pages.

I am living in @@Turin/class='about__link', a beautiful city in
               northern Italy.

As you probably know, We @@Romeo/class='about__link'(s) are famous for being passionate lovers.
Probably it is for this reason that I love what I do, and I am always looking for new exciting projects.
If you are interested in my work, feel free to contact me anytime.
Check out some of the projects below to see what I have been up to recently.
My hobbies include sports (bodybuilding in particular), gardening, writing (I wrote some technical articles for the Bov academy), reading some interesting book and, above all, enjoy my life.

Technologies: and a bit of passion & love
Modern Developer Home Page.description:
When @@BovAcademy/text='Richard Bovell'/class='about__link', the founder of @@BovAcademy/class='about__link', asked me to develop the new homepage for the course, sincerely, I was a little bit nervous because of the big responsibility.
Now I can say that I am very proud and honored to have been involved in a project so ambitious and formidable. The most difficult part was the synchronization of the various animations at different screen dimensions.
I want to say thank you to Richard for the great opportunity he gave me.

Evolution UI.description:
The first of its kind, Evolution UI is an open source front-end web framework comprising a collection of innovative and unique web components. These never-before-seen web components are intended to provide a different and enriched online experience and were created by the @@StudentsBovAcademy of Bov Academy Institute of Programming and Futuristic Engineering (you can learn more about this project and read a write-up on each component by visiting the @@BlogBovAcademy/evolution-ui-a-ui-framework-of-dozens-of-innovative-ui-components/ ).
This framework is intended to be a hub of web development innovation and we invite everyone to explore their creativity and contribute something innovative of their own to keep the project thriving.
I want to say thank all guys from the Evolution Core Team
